definitions.definition: a large tent used for eating and drinking in at events held mainly outside that involve a lot of people:
examples: We're planning to hold the wedding reception in a marquee in the garden.

definitions.definition: being the main performer or sports person in a show, film, sports event, etc. or being the performer, etc. whose name will attract most people to the show, film, etc.:
examples: The studio chiefs wanted a marquee name in the lead role, not some unknown.
